title: Crime Alert 02.12.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.12.19
description:
Ohio wife chops up husband with power tools and lives with the body, hidden in storage bins for months. To New York woman calls her mom in a panic, then vanishes. Her body found stuffed in suitcase near a wealthy Connecticut neighborhood. Kentucky 4-year-old girl passes out at school then tests positive for cocaine at the hospital.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
